entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:56 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
